article.title: Northrop Grumman Awarded $276 Million Contract to Field Battlefield Airborne Communications Node
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force has awarded Northrop Grumman Corporation a $276 million contract for fielding and operational deployment of the Battlefield Airborne Communications Node, an airborne communications system that provides warfighters with critical real-time battlefield information.
